name: Solar System Task
description:
A lonely Astronaut! 8 months Solar System journey!

In year 2020, human received a signal from the edge of the solar system. They sent a spacecraft to go there...

This is the most unique game have you ever played! You must spent 8 months to complete this game. Dive into the dark space: Moon, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune.

Explore the edge of the solar system and discover the source of the signal....
